thread.title: Friendly/helpful/attentive staff & convenient location
thread.title_full: Friendly/helpful/attentive staff & convenient location - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Doug S
title: Friendly/helpful/attentive staff & convenient location
text: Family of 4 stayed here for a short weekend and enjoyed the staff's friendly and helpful nature. The accommodations were nice and frankly bigger than expected for manhattan. The location was a reasonable walking distance from Grand Central with small overnight bags. Breakfast was good with staff that was more attentive than I've seen in other Residence Inns. I would definitely stay again or recommend to family and friends.
